title: Why do students choose AIIMS over their state medical colleges? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A. The AIIMSonian tag is a big contributor. Apart from this there are number of benefits where an AIIMS outshines state medical colleges. Less Fees- the fees in AIIMS for the whole five and a half year course is 5856 Rs only.It is a centrally funded institute.The facilities are far better than that of a state government College.Your overall development takes place.You meet people from the whole nation, which makes you informed of various cultures, languages and makes you more confident and social.An important part of your practice in the future is your communication skills… This is more better developed in AIIMS because of such a random bunch of people.The professors and academic is better.There are huge fests…!!!! (shoutout to ORIANA 2K19🎉🎊)So, there are loads of pros and cons for your consideration of preference of AIIMS over a state medical college.. (The pros do outweigh the cons😉)
